edu.memphis.ccrg.lida.transientepisodicmemory.sdm
Class QuickSparseDistributedMemory

java.lang.Object
  edu.memphis.ccrg.lida.transientepisodicmemory.sdm.QuickSparseDistributedMemory
All Implemented Interfaces:
SparseDistributedMemory
public class QuickSparseDistributedMemory
extends java.lang.Object
implements SparseDistributedMemory

Implementation of Kanerva's sparse distributed memory. This implementation is based on the model described in P. Kanerva, "Sparse Distributed Memory and Related Models" in Associative Neural Memories: Theory and Implementation , pp. 50-76, Oxford University Press, 1993.

Author:
Javier Snaider

QuickSparseDistributedMemory

public QuickSparseDistributedMemory(cern.colt.bitvector.BitVector[] a,
                                    int h,
                                    int counterMax,
                                    int u)
Constructor of the class that receives all the parameters necessary for this sparse distributed memory.

Parameters:
a - the address (hard locations) matrix
h - the activation radius
counterMax - the counter range
u - the word size

mappedStore

public void mappedStore(cern.colt.bitvector.BitVector wrd,
                        cern.colt.bitvector.BitVector mapping)
Stores a word in this sparse distributed memory using the word as address. The word is mapped (xor) with the mapping address.

Specified by:
mappedStore in interface SparseDistributedMemory
Parameters:
wrd - the word to be stored.
mapping - the mapping address.
